column1: This page may be outdated. Go here for the content source of truth: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-design-system-documentation/tree/main/src/_data/content/patterns/ask-users-for

column9: Enter a 10-digit phone number (with or without dashes)
column15: Removing "please" from error message. And removing "Home" before phone number to avoid any confusion that this needs to be a landline.

column6: Enter a 10-digit phone number that can send and receive SMS (text messages)
